entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Ree-Yees asked you to help him with some missing items, things that were stolen from the palace. After doing so he gave you permission to enter the palace and speak with Ephant Mon.
entries.journal_entry_description: There are plenty of people who live or work in Jabba's Palace who need things done. You're the person to do those things.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Ree-Yees is the official inventory keeper for Jabba's Palace. He wants you to find a bell that was stolen from Jabba by the Sand Splitters. The bell was last seen in the possession of one of the Sand Splitter knaves.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Jabba's missing a ledger containing valuable information. It was stolen by the Sand Splitters, and he demands it be returned. Find the thug that has it. It shouldn't take long.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: "Jabba's missing a ledger containing valuable information. It was stolen by the Sand Splitters. Jabba demands that it be returned. Find the ledger and make an example of the Sand Splitter brutes."
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: A ledger belonging to Jabba that contains valuable information was stolen by the Sand Splitters. Find the ledger and punish some Sand Splitter brutes to send them a message.
entries.task02_task_display_string_1: Retrieve Jabba's ledger from the Sand Splitters
entries.task03_comm_message_text: Jabba had a prototype warhead in the garage. It's missing. Those Sand Splitters once again.  I had no idea they stole so much when they left, but they've now gotten Jabba's attention. He wants an end to them once and for all.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: "Jabba had a prototype warhead in the garage. It's missing. Those Sand Splitters once again.  I had no idea they stole so much when they left, but they've now gotten Jabba's attention. He wants an end to them once and for all."
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: When the Sand Splitters left Jabba's organization, they took a prototype warhead with them. Jabba wants it back. He also wants these Sand Splitters ended. Take out their leaders and the rest will disperse.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Jabba's Palace and speak with Ree-Yees.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Erib Kurrugh and Saul Rouse formed the Sand Splitters when they left Jabba's organization. Defeat these two leaders and the Sand Splitters will fall apart.
entries.task06_journal_entry_title: Defeat Erib Kurrugh of the Sand Splitters
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Saul Rouse and Erib Kurrugh formed the Sand Splitters when they left Jabba's organization. Defeat these two leaders and the Sand Splitters will fall apart.
entries.task07_journal_entry_title: Defeat Saul Rouse of the Sand Splitters
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: The Sand Splitters stole a prototype warhead from Jabba. Find it.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: A ledger belonging to Jabba that contains valuable information was stolen by the Sand Splitters. Find the ledger in the Sand Splitters' cave.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Punish some Sand Splitter brutes to send them a message not to betray Jabba.
